set-variable.value: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- updatedPath: if (attributes.requestPath contains "v04") "v1" ++ (attributes.requestPath splitBy('v04')) [1] else if (attributes.requestPath contains "api/v01") "v1" ++ (attributes.requestPath splitBy('api/v01')) [1] else if (attributes.requestPath contains "api/v1") "v1" ++ (attributes.requestPath splitBy('api/v1')) [1] else if(attributes.requestPath contains ("/v01")) "v1" ++ (attributes.requestPath splitBy('v01')) [1] else if ((attributes.requestPath contains (p('http.preferences.apiName'))) or (attributes.requestPath contains (p('http.contacts.apiName')))) attributes.requestPath else "v1" ++ (attributes.requestPath splitBy('v01')) [1]]
set-variable.doc:name: Set MigratedPath

json-logger:logger.doc:name: Log Before Premise or Asset API Call
json-logger:logger.json-logger:content: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { (payload: payload) if ((attributes.method == "POST") or (attributes.method == "PUT")), attributes: attributes }]

http:request.doc:name: Call to Premise API
http:request.http:headers:
#[output application/json --- {
"X-Root-Correlation-Id" : attributes.headers.'X-Root-Correlation-Id' default correlationId, "Content-Type" : vars."v_content_type", "Source-System" : vars.'Source-System', "Target-System" : vars.'Target-System', }]

#[output application/json --- {

http:request.http:headers:
#[output application/json --- {
"X-Root-Correlation-Id" : attributes.headers.'X-Root-Correlation-Id' default correlationId, "Content-Type" : vars."v_content_type", "Source-System" : vars.'Source-System', "Target-System" : vars.'Target-System', }]

json-logger:logger.doc:name: Log Before Common Customers Call
json-logger:logger.json-logger:content: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { (payload: payload) if ((attributes.method == "POST") or (attributes.method == "PUT")), attributes: attributes }]

http:request.doc:name: Call to: Common Customers Request Calls
http:request.http:headers: #[output application/java --- { "ng_customer_number" : attributes.headers.'ng_customer_number' default null, "x-client_id" : "06e007c70cd14d66925a330fce5df7be", "ng_billingaccount_number" : attributes.headers.'ng_billingaccount_number', "Target-System" : attributes.headers.'Target-System' default "CSS", "x-client_secret" : "1Cb27727665d40Aa8E44BCf69a2a4b11", "Accept" : "application/json", "Source-System" : attributes.headers.'Source-System' default "Salesforce", "ng_premise_number" : attributes.headers.'ng_premise_number' default null, "Content-Type" : "application/json", "X-Root-Correlation-Id" : attributes.headers.'X-Root-Correlation-Id' default correlationId, }]

json-logger:logger.doc:name: Log After Common Customers Call
json-logger:logger.json-logger:content: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { payload: payload, attributes: attributes }]

json-logger:logger.doc:name: Log Before Common Call
json-logger:logger.json-logger:content: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { (payload: payload) if ((attributes.method == "POST") or (attributes.method == "PUT")), attributes: attributes }]

http:request.doc:name: Call to Common API
http:request.http:headers:
#[output application/json --- {
"X-Root-Correlation-Id" : attributes.headers.'X-Root-Correlation-Id' default correlationId, "Content-Type" : vars."v_content_type", "Source-System" : vars.'Source-System', "Target-System" : vars.'Target-System', }]

json-logger:logger.doc:name: Log Before Preferences Call
json-logger:logger.json-logger:content: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { (payload: payload) if ((attributes.method == "POST") or (attributes.method == "PUT")), attributes: attributes }]

http:request.doc:name: Call to Preferences API
http:request.http:headers:
#[output application/json --- {
"X-Root-Correlation-Id" : attributes.headers.'X-Root-Correlation-Id' default correlationId, "Content-Type" : vars."v_content_type", "client_id" : p('secure::http.preferences.client_id'), "client_secret" : p('secure::http.preferences.client_secret'), "customerId" : attributes.headers.customerId default "", "contactValue" : attributes.headers.contactValue default "", "emailAddress" : attributes.headers.emailAddress default "", "issuingAuthority" : attributes.headers.issuingAuthority default "", "billingAccountNumber": attributes.headers.billingAccountNumber default "", "regionFuelType": attributes.headers.regionFuelType default "", "dataUsePurpose": attributes.headers.dataUsePurpose default "" }]

json-logger:logger.doc:name: Log Before Contacts Call
json-logger:logger.json-logger:content: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { (payload: payload) if ((attributes.method == "POST") or (attributes.method == "PUT")), attributes: attributes }]

http:request.doc:name: Call to: Contacts Request Calls
http:request.http:headers:
#[output application/json --- {
"X-Root-Correlation-Id" : attributes.headers.'X-Root-Correlation-Id' default correlationId, "Content-Type" : vars."v_content_type", "client_id" : p('secure::http.contacts.client_id'), "client_secret" : p('secure::http.contacts.client_secret') }]

set-payload.value: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- {"message" : "Application is not configured in Proxy application. Invalid URI."}]
